code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Header from'./components/Header';import SearchBar from'./components/SearchBar';import ScorecardTable from'./components/ScorecardTable';import Options from'./components/Options';import'./styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[holes,setHoles]=useState([]);const handleSearch=courseName=>{fetch(`http://localhost:3001/api/golf-course?name=${courseName}`).then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}return response.json();}).then(data=>setHoles(data.holes)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));};const handlePar99=()=>{const newHoles=holes.map(hole=>{if(hole.hole_number>=10&&hole.hole_number<=18){return{...hole,hcp:hole.hcp+1};}else if(hole.hole_number>=1&&hole.hole_number<=9){return{...hole,hcp:hole.hcp+2};}return hole;});setHoles(newHoles);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{onSearch:handleSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScorecardTable,{holes:holes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Options,{onPar99:handlePar99})]});};export default App;
